text: On - Tot, kotoryy nisposlal spokoystviye v serdtsa veruyushchikh, chtoby ikh vera yeshcho bol'she utverdilas' i uvelichilas'. Tol'ko Allakhu odnomu prinadlezhat voinstva nebes i zemli. On vlasten nad nimi i rasporyazhayetsya imi, kak zhelayet. On ob"yemlet Svoim znaniyem vso sushcheye i obladayet polnoy i sovershennoy mudrost'yu, reshaya vse dela
